#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=How To Make Admirable Art
#Text=Everyone has a talent , which is part of what makes everyone special .
#Text=Maybe your talent is to be an artist who makes admirable art .
#Text=Wether its to paint , draw , sculpt , or other things , this article would be great for you .
#Text=Read on to find out how to make admirable art !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Buy art supplies .
#Text=You ca n't make art without the art supplies you need !
#Text=So you can go to any art store that you know and buy all the things that you need to make the art that you want !
#Text=Or if you already have all the things you need at home , you do n't have to worry about getting anything !
#Text=Think of what you want to make .
#Text=It is best for you to plan ahead of time for what you want to make before you start or even buy anything .
#Text=Make what you see .
#Text=True artists create artwork based on what they see , not what just everyone else sees , if you know what I mean .
#Text=But if you want , you can always just make what you feel like making .
#Text=Frame it .
#Text=If you would like , you could frame your artwork or just leave it how it is .
#Text=But a frame is always a great compliment to artwork .
#Text=And in my opinion , it make things look better , prettier , and would definitely make your art stand out .
#Text=Add your signature .
#Text=You should always put your name on your artwork so other people know who made it .
#Text=Artists usually write their signatures on the bottom right of their masterpieces , but you can write you 're signature wherever you want .
#Text=Add the date .
#Text=Writing the date is completely optional .
#Text=I just like to put the date on all my artwork so I know when I made the it .
#Text=If you are going to put the date on your 's , I would suggest you put it on the back .
#Text=But , if you must , you may put it on the front .
#Text=Practice .
#Text=Did you ever hear the saying : " practice makes perfect " ?
#Text=Well its true .
#Text=Well , practice makes things better , anyway .
#Text=Especially with art .
#Text=If you want to be a great artist , you should practice as much as you can .
#Text=And I promise you , the more you practice , the better and better you 'll become at art .
#Text=Tips
#Text=If you do n't want to or you just ca n't find an art store , but if you still want to make art , you can always go order art supplies online .
#Text=You will just have to wait the amount of time that it take for it to get delivered .
#Text=If you want to get an inspiration of what you should make , you can look online or even go explore and see what you think you should make
#Text=I would strongly suggest , if you ever want to post your artwork on social media or on the internet or something , you should always put your signature on it .
#Text=If not , someone can steal the picture of your artwork and claim it as their own .
